This site was created using R (version 3.5.1)

The following packages were used in this website data analysis for publically available data on an Online Grocery Store. 

Three graphs were produced to examine the data in the "2017 Online Grocery Store" tab of the website.

-flexdashboard

-tidyverse

-viridis

-plotly

-p8105.datasets
